headerDisplay: This plugin uses the existing Sengled Element Home app infrastructure to allow you to control your Sengled accessories.
footerDisplay: This plugin is still in beta. If you encounter any issues out of this product, [Issues](https://github.com/jfarmer08/homebridge-sengled-smart-home/issues) and [Pull Request](https://github.com/jfarmer08/homebridge-sengled-smart-home/pulls) are welcome.

name.title: Name
name.description: The name that will appear in your homebridge log.

username.title: Username
username.description: Your username of the Sengled account you used to register the device with in the Sengled app.

password.title: Password
password.description: Your password of the Sengled account you used to register the device with in the Sengled app.

debug.title: debug
debug.description: This will enable more logging information from the plugin.

Info.title: Info
Info.description: This will enable information from the plugin.

Timeout.title: Timeout
Timeout.description: The timeout in milliseconds to use for calls to the Sengled Web API. High values may result in other errors.

AlternateLoginApi.title: AlternateLoginApi
AlternateLoginApi.description: Uses an alternative login API if for some reason logins fail even with increased timeout.
